con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="HospitalInformationServiceService" targetNamespace="http://www.mule-health.com/HospitalInformation/" xmlns:ns1="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://www.mule-health.com/HospitalInformation/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://www.mule-health.com/HospitalInformation/" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="AdmissionRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="nationalIdNumber" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="lastName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="firstName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="dateOfBirth" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="gender" type="tns:GenderType"/> <xs:element name="nationality" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="address" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="procedure" type="tns:Procedure"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AdmissionResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="status" type="tns:StatusType"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="episode" type="tns:EpisodeType"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="insurance" type="tns:Insurance"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="EhrRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="patientId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="procedure" type="tns:Procedure"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Episode" nillable="true" type="tns:EpisodeType"/> <xs:complexType name="Procedure"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="type" type="tns:ProcedureType"/> <xs:element name="admission" type="tns:AdmissionType"/> <xs:element name="department" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="EpisodeType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="patientId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="episodeId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="startDate" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="minDurationDays" type="xs:integer"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Insurance"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="plan" type="tns:InsurancePlanType"/> <xs:element name="caseNumber" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Episode"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="patientId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="episodeId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="startDate" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="minDurationDays" type="xs:integer"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="GenderType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="MALE"/> <xs:enumeration value="FEMALE"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ProcedureType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="IN_PATIENT"/> <xs:enumeration value="DAY_PATIENT"/> <xs:enumeration value="OUT_PATIENT"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="AdmissionType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="ELECTIVE"/> <xs:enumeration value="EMERGENCY"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="StatusType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="ADMISSABLE"/> <xs:enumeration value="NOT_ADMISSABLE"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="InsurancePlanType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="BASIC"/> <xs:enumeration value="PREMIUM"/> <xs:enumeration value="ROYAL"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="admitResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:AdmissionResponse" name="admissionResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="admit"> <wsdl:part element="tns:AdmissionRequest" name="admissionRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="HospitalInformationService"> <wsdl:operation name="admit"> <wsdl:input message="tns:admit" name="admit"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:admitResponse" name="admitResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="HospitalInformationServiceServiceSoapBinding" type="tns:HospitalInformationService"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="admit"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.mule-health.com/HospitalInformation/admit" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="admit"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="admitResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="HospitalInformationServiceService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:HospitalInformationServiceServiceSoapBinding" name="HospitalInformationServicePort"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:9090/admissions"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>
